column1:
Join the JACL
in Our Mission for Civil Rights!:Founded in 1929
column2:
the Japanese American Citizens League (JACL) is the nation’s first and largest Asian American civil rights organization.

As a 501(c)3 nonprofit charitable organization
column3: the JACL champions and advocates for the Japanese American
column5: and civil rights communities through advocacy
column7:
and leadership development.:Why Become a JACL Member?
Your membership matters! As a member
column8: you’ll join a community of thousands of JACL members who believe in social justice
